articles.description: Ally McCoist calls it a "disgrace" and Jermaine Jenas says Newcastle were "robbed" as a controversial late penalty denies them a memorable victory at Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Why was PSG penalty against Newcastle given?

articles.description: Manchester City come from two goals behind to beat RB Leipzig and finish top of Champions League Group G.
articles.title: Man City come back from two down to beat Leipzig

articles.description: Barcelona qualify for the Champions League knockout stages for the first time since 2020-21 after beating Porto.
articles.title: Barcelona come from behind to reach last 16

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe scores a late penalty to deny Newcastle an impressive win at Parc des Princes but the draw keeps the visitors in the fight to reach the Champions League knockout stages.
articles.title: Newcastle denied win at PSG by late Mbappe penalty

articles.description: Glenn Maxwell hits the joint-fastest T20 century for Australia as the tourists keep alive their series hopes against India.
articles.title: Maxwell's record-equalling ton leads Australia to victory

articles.description: Tiger Woods says he will continue to play while he still thinks he can win as he prepares for his return to professional golf.
articles.title: Woods will play until he can 'no longer win'

articles.description: Once it was China, not Saudi Arabia, on a multi-million pound recruitment drive to buy in the world's best football talent. In just a few years though, the Chinese Super League's big-money plans have imploded.
articles.title: From bidding for Bale to selling the team bus - the fall of the CSL

articles.description: Celtic's hopes of making progress in Europe end in frustrating fashion after Ciro Immobile's late double denies them a draw with Lazio.
articles.title: Late Immobile double ends Celtic's Euro ambitions

articles.description: England under-21s winger Jamie Bynoe-Gittens scores as Borussia Dortmund qualify for the Champions League last 16 by beating AC Milan.
articles.title: Dortmund beat AC Milan to qualify for last 16

articles.description: Former England all-rounder Adam Hollioake is appointed Pakistan's batting coach for their forthcoming Test series in Australia.
articles.title: Pakistan name Hollioake batting coach for Test tour
